fields.desc: Don't let people use this checkpoint if they're OOB.
fields.name: disableOOB

fields.desc: Offset from checkpoint pad that you will respawn. Normal is 0 0 3, but blank will use current gravity.
fields.name: add

fields.desc: If true, the checkpoint will spawn the player with gravity relative to the its rotation on respawn.
fields.name: gravity

fields.desc: If ticked off then you won't get a checkpoint on collision, this is recommended to be used in conjunction with Checkpoint Trigger.
fields.name: chkcollide

fields.desc: Name of the next path node object.
fields.name: NextNode

fields.desc: Delay this long after hitting the node before going to the next one.
fields.name: Delay

fields.desc: How long it takes to get to the next node.
fields.name: TimeToNext

fields.desc: Smooth start only. Smoothing is cosine like a PathedInterior's "Accelerate".
fields.name: SmoothStart

fields.desc: Smooth end only. Smoothing is cosine like a PathedInterior's "Accelerate".
fields.name: SmoothEnd

fields.desc: Smooth both start and end. Smoothing is cosine like a PathedInterior's "Accelerate".
fields.name: Smooth

fields.desc: If the object being moved should use the node's position.
fields.name: UsePosition

fields.desc: If the object being moved should use the node's rotation.
fields.name: UseRotation

fields.desc: If the object being moved should use the node's scale.
fields.name: UseScale

fields.desc: If the direction of rotation should be reversed.
fields.name: ReverseRotation

fields.desc: Multiply rotation amounts by this value.
fields.name: RotationMultiplier

fields.desc: If the node should use a Bezier curve for smoothing progress (needs Bezier handle objects, use node editor to create them).
fields.name: bezier

fields.desc: Name of the object which is the first Bezier handle.
fields.name: BezierHandle1

fields.desc: Name of the object which is the second Bezier handle.
fields.name: BezierHandle2

fields.desc: If the node should use a Spline curve for smoothing progress.
fields.name: spline

fields.desc: Additional rotation applied after all other rotation calculations.
fields.name: FinalRotOffset

fields.desc: Space-separated list of possible next nodes for this node. One will be randomly picked.
fields.name: branchNodes

fields.desc: Move along path at this speed instead of using the Time to Next.
fields.name: Speed

fields.desc: This is true if the node has been inited already.
fields.name: placed

fields.desc: Which skin to use (see skin selector).
fields.name: skin

fields.desc: If the player needs to charge the cannon by holding fire.
fields.name: useCharge

fields.desc: How long it takes to fully charge the cannon.
fields.name: chargeTime

fields.desc: How much force is applied when the cannon fires.
fields.name: force

fields.desc: Default initial camera pitch (up/down) in degrees. For reference, 0 = straight ahead, 85 = near straight up, -85 = near straight down.
fields.name: pitch

fields.desc: Default initial camera yaw (left/right) in degrees. For reference, 0 or 360 = +y direction, 90 = +x direction, 180 = -y direction, 270 = -x direction.
fields.name: yaw

fields.desc: Absolute maximum degrees for pitch. 85 = near straight up.
fields.name: pitchBoundHigh

fields.desc: Absolute minimum degrees for pitch. -85 = near straight down.
fields.name: pitchBoundLow

fields.desc: If the yaw limits should be enabled
fields.name: yawLimit

fields.desc: Maximum degrees left you can point relative to the starting yaw. 180 = straight backwards.
fields.name: yawBoundLeft

fields.desc: Maximum degrees right you can point relative to the starting yaw. 180 = straight backwards.
fields.name: yawBoundRight

fields.desc: If the cannon fires instantly on enter.
fields.name: instant

fields.desc: Delay fire for an instant cannon by this much.
fields.name: instantDelayTime

fields.desc: If a base should be created for this cannon (if none exists).
fields.name: useBase

fields.desc: For how long after firing controls are locked.
fields.name: lockTime

fields.desc: If the camera should be locked after firing too.
fields.name: lockCam

fields.desc: Name of the object which is this cannon's base.
fields.name: basename

fields.desc: Show a reticle in the center that displays the cannon's power.
fields.name: showReticle

fields.desc: Show rings for helping players to aim. NOTE: May be inaccurate over long distances or with gravity changes/triggers.
fields.name: showAim

fields.desc: Radius of the rings used for aim assist. Marble radius is 0.2
fields.name: aimSize

fields.desc: Account for PhysMod triggers with the aim assist rings... Adds significant lag though.
fields.name: aimTriggers

fields.name: useCharge

fields.desc: How long it takes to fully charge the cannon.
fields.name: chargeTime

fields.desc: How much force is applied when the cannon fires.
fields.name: force

fields.desc: Default initial camera pitch (up/down) in degrees. For reference, 0 = straight ahead, 85 = near straight up, -85 = near straight down.
fields.name: pitch

fields.desc: Default initial camera yaw (left/right) in degrees. For reference, 0 or 360 = +y direction, 90 = +x direction, 180 = -y direction, 270 = -x direction.
fields.name: yaw

fields.desc: Absolute maximum degrees for pitch. 85 = near straight up.
fields.name: pitchBoundHigh

fields.desc: Absolute minimum degrees for pitch. -85 = near straight down.
fields.name: pitchBoundLow

fields.desc: If the yaw limits should be enabled
fields.name: yawLimit

fields.desc: Maximum degrees left you can point relative to the starting yaw. 180 = straight backwards.
fields.name: yawBoundLeft

fields.desc: Maximum degrees right you can point relative to the starting yaw. 180 = straight backwards.
fields.name: yawBoundRight

fields.desc: If the cannon fires instantly on enter.
fields.name: instant

fields.desc: Delay fire for an instant cannon by this much.
fields.name: instantDelayTime

fields.desc: If a base should be created for this cannon (if none exists).
fields.name: useBase

fields.desc: For how long after firing controls are locked.
fields.name: lockTime

fields.desc: If the camera should be locked after firing too.
fields.name: lockCam

fields.desc: Name of the object which is this cannon's base.
fields.name: basename

fields.desc: Show a reticle in the center that displays the cannon's power.
fields.name: showReticle

fields.desc: Show rings for helping players to aim. NOTE: May be inaccurate over long distances or with gravity changes/triggers.
fields.name: showAim

fields.desc: Radius of the rings used for aim assist. Marble radius is 0.2
fields.name: aimSize

fields.desc: Account for PhysMod triggers with the aim assist rings... Adds significant lag though.
fields.name: aimTriggers

fields.desc: If the player needs to charge the cannon by holding fire.
fields.name: useCharge

fields.name: chargeTime

fields.desc: Text that is shown to the player when they enter the trigger.
fields.name: text

fields.desc: If the trigger should only show once (resets on restart).
fields.name: displayonce

fields.desc: For how long the help message will be visible after entering the trigger.
fields.name: persistTime

fields.desc: If the extended help dialog should be used instead.
fields.name: extended

fields.desc: If true, the trigger will spawn the player with gravity relative to the trigger's rotation on respawn.
fields.name: gravity

fields.desc: Use the trigger's center instead of spawning at its "position" (corner).
fields.name: center

fields.desc: How many times the player has to enter the trigger to activate it.
fields.name: NumTimesToTrigger

fields.desc: If the trigger only activates one time.
fields.name: TriggerOnce

fields.desc: If triggered, entering the trigger a multiple of this many times will activate it again.
fields.name: NumTimesToRepeat

fields.desc: If laps mode, the trigger will only activate on this lap.
fields.name: ActivateOnLap

fields.desc: The time to which the PathedInterior will travel when the trigger is activated.
fields.name: targetTime

fields.desc: Optional time for DelayTriggerGoToTargets to use.
fields.name: delayTargetTime

fields.desc: Which PowerUp to activate when the player enters the trigger.
fields.name: powerup

fields.desc: How many points to add or subtract.
fields.name: gemBonus

fields.desc: How much bonus time to add.
fields.name: timeBonus

fields.desc: For how long the transition should take
fields.name: Time

fields.desc: If the distance transition should be smooth
fields.name: Smooth

fields.desc: Camera distance to set.
fields.name: Distance

fields.desc: If the camera should not revert when leaving the trigger.
fields.name: KeepEffectOnLeave

fields.desc: Optional value to force camera distance when leaving the trigger.
fields.name: ForceExitValue

fields.desc: If the trigger should align you on the x-axis.
fields.name: x

fields.desc: If the trigger should align you on the y-axis.
fields.name: y

fields.desc: If the trigger should align you on the z-axis.
fields.name: z

fields.desc: If on, the trigger will always align when the marble is inside it.
fields.name: alwaysOn

fields.desc: If the trigger should only work once.
fields.name: TriggerOnce

fields.desc: Velocity the trigger will set.
fields.name: velocity

fields.desc: If the trigger should not affect velocity on the x-axis.
fields.name: ignoreX

fields.desc: If the trigger should not affect velocity on the y-axis.
fields.name: ignoreY

fields.desc: If the trigger should not affect velocity on the z-axis.
fields.name: ignoreZ

fields.desc: If the trigger should cancel velocity on the x-axis.
fields.name: cancelX

fields.desc: If the trigger should cancel velocity on the y-axis.
fields.name: cancelY

fields.desc: If the trigger should cancel velocity on the z-axis.
fields.name: cancelZ

fields.desc: Camera pitch to set
fields.name: pitch

fields.desc: Camera yaw to set
fields.name: yaw

fields.desc: If the values are in radians
fields.name: useRadians

fields.desc: How long the countdown lasts.
fields.name: time

fields.desc: Name of the icon to put next to the countdown timer. Should be the name of a file in platinum/client/ui/game/countdown/
fields.name: icon

fields.desc: How long to wait before starting the countdown.
fields.name: startDelay

fields.desc: If the trigger should only activate once (resets on restart).
fields.name: activateOnce

fields.desc: What music to play when you enter the trigger.
fields.name: text

fields.desc: What AudioProfile(sound) to play when you enter the trigger.
fields.name: sfx

fields.desc: If the trigger only activates one time.
fields.name: TriggerOnce

fields.desc: 0.6666 for Mega Scale, 0.2 for Gold Scale, 0.3 for Ultra Scale, 0.18975 for Normal Scale
fields.name: mbsize

fields.desc: If ticked then the help text & SFX won't play.
fields.name: indicator

fields.desc: Added velocity along the X axis in units/sec.
fields.name: xforce

fields.desc: Added velocity along the Y axis in units/sec.
fields.name: yforce

fields.desc: Added velocity along the Z axis in units/sec.
fields.name: zforce

fields.desc: Which direction the sun will point towards upon entering the trigger.
fields.name: dirvalue

fields.desc: What color the sun will be upon entering the trigger.
fields.name: colorvalue

fields.desc: How bright the sun will be upon entering the trigger.
fields.name: ambvalue

fields.desc: What skybox the level will change to upon entering the trigger. Place the file path of the skybox here.
fields.name: skybox

fields.desc: Rotation of the gravity to set; think Gravity Modifiers.
fields.name: SimRotation

fields.desc: If false, change gravity on enter, if true, change on leave.
fields.name: onLeave

fields.desc: Moving along this axis will change the gravity.
fields.name: MeasureAxis

fields.desc: If the gravity measure should be inverted.
fields.name: FlipMeasure

fields.desc: If the rotation direction is inverted.
fields.name: ReverseRot

fields.desc: Angle at which your gravity will be at the start of the trigger.
fields.name: StartingGravityRot

fields.desc: Angle at the end of the trigger.
fields.name: EndingGravityRot

fields.desc: Axis along which your gravity changes.
fields.name: GravityAxis

fields.desc: Gravity will rotate around this axis.
fields.name: Axis

fields.desc: If not blank, rotate around this point instead of trigger's center
fields.name: CustomPoint

fields.desc: Point outwards instead of inwards.
fields.name: Invert

fields.desc: Trigger will only work within this radius (if UseRadius is checked).
fields.name: RadiusSize

fields.desc: If the max radius should be used.
fields.name: UseRadius

fields.desc: Blank to not reset, 1 to reset to gravity on enter, otherwise a rotation axis-angle. Down is 1 0 0 180
fields.name: RestoreGravity

fields.desc: If not blank, rotate around this point instead of trigger's center
fields.name: CustomPoint

fields.desc: Point outwards instead of inwards.
fields.name: Invert

fields.desc: Trigger will only work within this radius (if UseRadius is checked).
fields.name: RadiusSize

fields.desc: If the max radius should be used.
fields.name: UseRadius

fields.desc: If leaving should point gravity straight up or straight down depending on offset.
fields.name: UpDownLeave

fields.desc: Multiply marble velocity by this factor when entering the water trigger.
fields.name: VelocityMultiplier

fields.desc: If the trigger should not spawn any emitters.
fields.name: noEmitters

fields.desc: Name of the object to respawn on.
fields.name: respawnPoint

fields.desc: Offset from checkpoint pad that you will respawn. Normal is 0 0 3, but blank will use current gravity.
fields.name: add

fields.desc: If true, the checkpoint will spawn the player with gravity relative to the checkpoint's rotation on respawn.
fields.name: gravity

fields.desc: Name of the destination object.
fields.name: destination

fields.desc: How long you have to wait to teleport.
fields.name: delay

fields.desc: If the teleporter should use the destination's center and not it's position (this is probably what you want).
fields.name: centerDestPoint

fields.desc: Don't reset marble velocity when teleporting.
fields.name: keepVelocity

fields.desc: If marble velocity should be inverted when teleporting.
fields.name: inverseVelocity

fields.desc: Don't reset angular velocity when teleporting.
fields.name: keepAngular

fields.desc: Don't reset camera direction when teleporting.
fields.name: keepCamera

fields.desc: Set marble's camera yaw to this value (in radians) after teleporting.
fields.name: cameraYaw

fields.desc: Getting this many gems will activate the teleporter.
fields.name: GemsToActivate

fields.desc: Getting this many gems will deactivate the teleporter.
fields.name: GemsToDeactivate

fields.desc: Alert the player if they don't have the right number of gems.
fields.name: DisplayGemsMessage

fields.desc: Don't play a noise. Very handy for sneaky triggers.
fields.name: silent

fields.desc: Name of the destination object.
fields.name: destination

fields.desc: How long you have to wait to teleport.
fields.name: delay

fields.desc: Don't play a noise. Very handy for sneaky triggers.
fields.name: silent

fields.desc: Offset distance will be scaled by this vector.
fields.name: TPScale

fields.desc: Offset this much from the destination trigger's center.
fields.name: TPOffset

fields.desc: If the trigger should allow players to respawn at it.
fields.name: enableRespawning

fields.desc: If the spawn point field should be used.
fields.name: customSpawnPoint

fields.desc: Transform (position and rotation) where players will spawn if they fall OOB (Multiplayer only).
fields.name: spawnPoint

fields.desc: Gravity rotation to use when respawning (blank = use current).
fields.name: forceGravity

fields.desc: Sequence number for this trigger, has to be 1 greater than the previous trigger. First trigger has to be 1.
fields.name: checkpointNumber

fields.desc: If the trigger should allow players to respawn at it.
fields.name: enableRespawning

fields.desc: If the spawn point field should be used.
fields.name: customSpawnPoint

fields.desc: Transform (position and rotation) where players will spawn if they fall OOB (Multiplayer only).
fields.name: spawnPoint

fields.desc: Gravity rotation to use when respawning (blank = use current).
fields.name: forceGravity

fields.desc: How many points per second this trigger gives.
fields.name: multiplier

fields.desc: Plane to start 2D mode in (xz xy yz or a degree value)
fields.name: Plane

fields.desc: If the plane should be rotated 180 degrees.
fields.name: InvertDirection

fields.desc: Don't reset to 3D when leaving the trigger.
fields.name: KeepEffectOnLeave

fields.desc: Override any other 2D mode that is currently active
fields.name: Override

fields.desc: Set the marble's camera distance to this when entering or NoChange to not change it.
fields.name: CamDistance

fields.desc: Set the marble's camera pitch (in degrees) to this when entering or NoChange to not change it.
fields.name: targetPitch

fields.desc: Time along path the trigger will start traveling towards. -1 for looping forwards, -2 for looping backwards.
fields.name: targetTime

fields.desc: Instantly warp to the target time along the path.
fields.name: instant

fields.desc: If instant, the platform will start traveling towards this time after warping. Zero to disable.
fields.name: IContinueToTTime

fields.desc: If the player enters a TriggerGotoDelayTarget after this trigger, the platform will continue to this time.
fields.name: delayTargetTime
